verbose_text: In view of her skin condition, off-label intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG) was administered (20 g/d x 5 days) together with HCQ 400 mg/d, and mycophenolate mofetil (MMF) was started at the dose of 500 mg bd and increased weekly by 250 mg bd to a maximum dose of 1 g bd, together with enalapril 5 mg/d.
evidence: MMF) was started at the dose of 500 mg bd and increased weekly by 250 mg
